parameters.name: AliyunLang
parameters.description: The language. Valid values: zh and en. Default value: zh.

parameters.name: CreateAuthToken
parameters.description: Specifies whether to create a token to improve data security.

parameters.name: EnvironmentId
parameters.description: The ID of the environment instance.

parameters.name: ManagedType
parameters.description:
Whether agents or exporters are managed. Valid values:

*   none: No. By default, no managed agents or exporters are provided for ACK clusters.
*   agent: Agents are managed. By default, managed agents are provided for ASK clusters, ACS clusters, and ACK One clusters.
*   agent-exproter: Agents and exporters are managed. By default, managed agents and exporters are provided for cloud services.
